Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This gorgeous little hotel is situated right next to the Pantheon but feels like a quiet respite from the busy streets of Paris From the moment you step in the door you can tell that much care has been taken in decorating and furnishing this hotel There are so many lovely touches throughout the common areas and the guest rooms From the beamed ceilings to the rotary phones and other decor our rooms were beautiful and charming The bathrooms are very modern super clean and comfortable The bed was wonderful And we appreciated the air conditioning Breakfast served in the stone walled cellar was delightful Truly the best scrambled eggs I have ever had The hotel backs up to a quiet neighborhood with a number of restaurants cafes and patisseries that we really enjoyed Last but not least the staff at reception and throughout the hotel were so gracious and friendly We look forward to returning to the Hotel Les Dames du Pantheon

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: I got room 1 which is literally by the bar on the ground floor and with room window on the street So obviously noisy and a bit odd Avoid
Positive_Review: Splendid location

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: I think it would be a good idea to have breakfast as part of the accommodation with a couple tables and chairs outside the hotel just because it is such a perfect location
Positive_Review: The location was amazing The staff were welcoming had no difficulty with English and the staff went above and beyond to make sure we had everything and anything we needed

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Small rooms as usual in Paris
Positive_Review: Awesomely located you can see the Pantheon form your window Rooms not that big but incredible decoration will repeat if we have the chance

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: The hotel was rather expensive and breakfast was not included in the price They said afterwards that the breakfast costs 18 Euros per person There was an extra charge for the city tax Although it claimed to be 4 star it did not have facilities like sauna or gym The safety box was very small and you cannot put your laptop in it
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: I didn t try breakfast so can t comment
Positive_Review: Great location very easy to get to from airport Lots of little restaurants nearby Pantheon just opposite Lovely

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: I think there must be a kettle in the room so a guest can make himself a cup of tea or coffee I was very surprised that we didn t have it considering the fact that this is four star hotel
Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly and helpful The room is beautiful and clean the location is perfect

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Our cab ride to the airport left us at the wrong terminal at considerable inconvenience
Positive_Review: Small comfortable hotel near the Pantheon but not near most Left Bank sites

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Room was very small and view onto a back courtyard and seemed expensive for what it was
Positive_Review: Great location near the Pantheon and close to Luxembourg fast RER tube line to and from Gare du Nord Great breakfast

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Considering the price the room and toilet was small the wifi is slow and definitely the breakfast needs improving
Positive_Review: Good location and staff are friendly and helpful they even let us leave our luggage for a few days

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: I found my room was very poorly distributed in terms of space It becomes very uncomfortable A door impossible to open and which closes automatically behind you divides the bedroom from the entrance and bathroom toilet area You have to cope with that door several times a day Bathroom and toilet are very oppressive Breakfast is 18 and certainly not worth it Apart from these two points I d say this is a nice hotel
Positive_Review: This hotel couldn t be better placed The Panth on is so close you get the feeling you can touch it Charming views

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Staff was less helpful than I have encountered in other Parisian hotels We didn t ask for help though and tend to keep to ourselves so it may be different if you approach them more Even leaving at 5 AM there was no offer to help us with airport transportation The bar set up is weird Not sure how you d even get a drink but it didn t matter because so many things were nearby The pillows were beyond flat this is probably my only real complaint and one night the street was extremely noisy con of a popular area
Positive_Review: Location to RER notre dame and cafes The view was great of the Pantheon Luxe decor in a great way All the wall paper was fabric and really made the space romantic and unique The hotel was very clean and you can tell they take care of the space Room size was adequate it is Europe Also they really maximized space with a different layout Good wi fi Overall this was a solid hotel choice with nice amenities and location It definitely has more of a boutique feel than other hotels we ve stayed

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location of the property was excellent just a short walk from Luxembourg train station with direct links to the airport and walking distance to the major attractions

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great view of the Pantheon sumptuous interior decor and very friendly staff Within easy walking distance of the RER and metro and in proximity to lots of bars and restaurants

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Bit annoyed as I was the one who booked several rooms for friends and I was the one who didn t end up getting an upgrade Bit poor
Positive_Review: Great location Very clean Lovely rooms

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: What wasn t tonice was the fact that the bed wasn t made in the same lovely way as on our arrival
Positive_Review: The styling of the hotel and especially our room is very tasteful

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Price is very high for what you get in this hotel You can get similar facilities and even similar room size which was not exceptional in much cheaper hotels in the area
Positive_Review: The location was great especially since I had a room with a view over the pantheon Room size what decent

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: the wifi was not the best connection
Positive_Review: fresh squeezed orange juice Croissants and bread both excellent AND you offer eggs Your coffee was also very good

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We loved loved loved this hotel Last night of our three week road trip Having driven Madrid Granada Valencia and Barcelona This was our favourite city hotel As we booked on the day we received a fantastic discount so it was exceptional value for money The staff were really helpful in suggesting where to visit even when we decided to go out at midnight for pancakes

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: The rooms are very small and therefore I think it is overpriced
Positive_Review: Breakfast was too expensive so we went out on both days Would have preferred to eat in the hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: We had prepaid through booking com but on three separate occasions staff said that we had to pay on departure for the full amount We had all the receipts and so did they as it turned out but it was a bit annoying to go through this each time It affected what otherwise was a very enjoyable stay
Positive_Review: Location was good Very quiet at night Staff were friendly and very helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff was super helpful and kind spoke some English Being near the Pantheon and the Park were awesome bonuses for people watching Great local markets nearby The beds were comfortable and a good size

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: I loved the quirky d cor the staff were delightful the bed was comfortable and everything was spotlessly clean My room had a stunning view of the Panth on

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: I was travelling as carer to an elderly Parkinson s patient requested a room for the disabled there were no grab handles in the shower or at the toilet which was very dangerous the sink was totally impractical for a 4 hotel there should be tea coffee available in room the electricity fused twice hair dryer issue rooms really small not sure of 4 rating
Positive_Review: The comfort of the bed was excellent as was the quality of the bed linen The staff were excellent

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: We really loved everything The one thing I would have liked in the bedroom was a kettle
Positive_Review: The hotel is beautifully decorated and lots of fun too Breakfast was lovely we had it delivered to our room The coffee wasn t great but it didn t matter The room was lovely and quiet in fact we were amazed by the lack of noise Bathroom beautiful We were there for business husband and wife work together but it was also fabulous as a romantic break hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Room is a bit small it s hard to open the luggage on the floor There s no bathtub for the price we pay it s kinda pity
Positive_Review: Love the bathroom and you can see the Pantheon from the windows The bed is comfortable and breakfast in the room was great Staff there are nice and able to help any problems very helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel in a fantastic part of the city The staff went above and beyond to make our first trip to Paris one to remember We will definitely be returning in the future

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Not possible to order lunch Dining room did not look great But there are plenty of eateries very close by This should not put you off
Positive_Review: Comfortable beds Room had a good view Pleasant staff Clean Good location I would happily return for another short stay if using the room for a base to see the city from

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Breakfast was a bit expensive No kettle in the room to make hot drinks
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff Excellent location for museums and sites etc Lovely room and bathroom with comfy bed

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: The pillows in particular and duvet could have been softer and more comfortable Perhaps a choice of feather down or synthetic
Positive_Review: The rooms were beautifully decorated and comfortable lovely and warm which was important as we were visiting in February Breakfast was delicious a choice of hot food buttery croissant fruit and baguette to mention just a few of the goodies on offer The staff were delightful and very attentive but discreet Location was good and the general area is full of interesting places to discover

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Sheets were clean but could have been newer and bed slightly softer
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and helpful and place felt fairly informal Room had interesting decor and there was a nice bathroom with large shower Nice little balcony to enjoy the view from

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: A couple of sockets didn t work which meant we kept not charging our phones til the last minute
Positive_Review: Lovely staff who couldn t be more helpful beautiful rooms very comfortable good breakfast excellent location great view

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: I would have liked breakfast for the cost but so many places to eat around the location not a deal breaker
Positive_Review: The deluxe room with the view of the pantheon was wonderful plush decoration very opulent and romantic Great location a short walk to everything Found a fab eatery just around the corner staff friendly Can t fault

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: The d cor was immaculate and of great quality but it was a bit over designed
Positive_Review: A charming hotel in a great location with very comfortable room and a great in room breakfast option

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: Maybe slightly costly but compared to several others there was not much in it
Positive_Review: Quirky decor to fit the theme perfectly and great position outside the pantheon for views Location was perfect for us with a metro station close in any direction Staff were excellent in all respects

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: The rooms are a tad small but that s Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Les Dames du Panth on
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We enjoyed our stay at this boutique hotel Despite overlooking that I only booked one room for our family of four only double occupancy the staff were kind enough to accommodate us with a second room We picked the hote not only for it s location but also for the theme of famous females of France It is conveniently located in the Latin Quarter and within walking distance of the Luxembourg Gardens We had to leave the next morning but we plan to come back for another stay
